items.sentence: I\'m glad you warned me before it was too late.
I\'m going to have breakfast with Tom tomorrow.
I\'m going to stay for another couple of weeks.
Tom discovered two dead bodies in his basement.
Tom does a pretty good job concealing his pain.
I hope Tom doesn\'t think we\'ve forgotten him.
The road between here and Tom\'s is pretty bad.
I think it\'s time for me to sharpen my pencil.
I thought you weren\'t supposed to talk to Tom.
Tom and his friends asked me to come with them.
Tom and his friends painted the barn yesterday.
I\'m sure I\'ve seen that guy somewhere before.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t have to work late tonight.
I\'m sure we should\'ve turned left back there.
I\'ve always dreamed of owning my own business.
I\'ve been bitten by mosquitos all over my arm.
I\'ve been flying commercial jets for 13 years.
Tom isn\'t supposed to get paid for doing that.
Tom thought Mary\'s behavior was inappropriate.
Why are you planning on going home early today?
